overview_of_class:
To prepare students for a world in which digital and computational literacy are critical to many career paths, particularly in areas related to digital media, big data and design, This course will consist of a series of workshops for undergraduates that will develop their familiarity with:
?how algorithms, data and core computational mechanisms function, as well as the pervasive role and influence of these mechanisms in everyday life,
?interpreting and understanding ?code,' with a focus on being conversant with software engineers and developers,
?familiarity with and ability to use key computational tools and online resources for solving problems, debugging and seeking additional knowledge.
name: Computing Everywhere
title: SoC GEN_CMN 206-0-20 Computing Everywhere
